message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I'll give you 40, you can give me 60. It's a good start!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 55/45, with me taking a slightly larger share.
I'll give you 42, you can give me 58. I'm still willing to compromise, but not too much!
I'm raising my offer again, Bob. 60 for me, 40 for you. Time is running out, and we need to reach an agreement soon.
